pr_title: [Websocket]Update produce request and acknowledge for WebSocket.

timeline.message: Update produce request for Websocket as it shares common struct with the produce req/ack we want to add for REST API, the change also make it possible to add schema support for Websocket producer later.

timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.bodyText: @Data annotation will generate the Getters for all fields and Setters for all non-final fields. So we don't need to add the @Setter @Getter here.
timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.message: Don't use star import for lombok annotations, remove Getter,Setter annotation as we already using Data.
